title: 无法启动游戏
author: Jokey_钥匙
txt_content:
本帖最后由 467440721 于 2019-7-9 09:05 编辑 

# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x00007ffe2dba02ee, pid=4968, tid=0x00000000000007f0
#
# JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_211-b12) (build 1.8.0_211-b12)
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (25.211-b12 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops)
# Problematic frame:
# C  [ig9icd64.dll+0x202ee]

#
# An error report file with more information is saved as:
# F:\Minecraft\.minecraft\hs_err_pid4968.log

#   http://bugreport.java.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
# The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
# See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
#

[error occurred during error reporting , id 0xc0000005]

对不起金粒只有这么多（

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
Q:提示“EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005)”错误提示时如何修复?
答:造成原因有很多，可能是显卡，可能是OpenGL（3D加速）也可能是Java问题
如何知道具体是哪个呢？
在崩溃信息内查找“problematic frame”部分
如果是ig4icd32.dll, ig4dev32.dll, ig7icd64.dll, ig7dev64.dll，那么是就显卡问题你可以尝试更新显卡，或者你如果有其他显卡就转换其他显卡。
你需要一个泰坦显卡（滑稽）
